column1: Useful, if you want to make 'Catalog' menu item with list of all categories in dropdown.
column2: Útil, se você quiser fazer 'Catálogo' de item do menu com a lista de todas as categorias no menu suspenso.

column1: Top Level Categories Options (See the 'Submenu global preferences' tab to setup nested levels)
column2: Top Level Categories Options (See the 'Submenu global preferences' tab to setup nested levels)

column1: Set this value to max level count, to use menu as fully expanded menu without dropdowns (100 - whould be enough)
column2: Set this value to max level count, to use menu as fully expanded menu without dropdowns (100 - whould be enough)

column1: An error occurred while trying to delete the menu.
column2: An error occurred while trying to delete the menu.

column1: Are you sure you want to delete this menu?
column2: Are you sure you want to delete this menu?

column1: Affects, when columns count is more than one. Otherwise, you will not see the difference
column2: Afeta, quando a contagem de colunas é mais do que um. Caso contrário, você não vai ver a diferença

column1: Max items count to show per column
column2: Contagem máxima de itens a ser mostrado por coluna

column1: Leave empty, to show all items
column2: Deixe em branco, para mostrar todos os itens

column1: Use value below 0, to insert item before category
